title: AWS and Microsoft are selling much more than cloud services
summary:
Ten, twenty years ago customers over at large corporations would often ask me what hardware they’d need to run my software. As software developers, we’d tend to be rather blas√© about such questions: “whatever you have lying around!”. If pressed, we’d say you’d need this much RAM and that much storage.
We thought we were doing our users a tremendous favor by being so flexible. Yet, customers were very much not happy with our responses.
